item.title: CityGuide: Go WebApp to Share Locations
item.description: CityGuide: Go WebApp to Share Locations CityGuide is a WebApp to help you discover and share cool spots in cities. These guides are useful for backpackers, digital nomads, and people new in town that are keen to discover cool things. For the past year, I’ve been improving my Go coding skills with the goal of achieving a new milestone in my career. Similarly, I’ve been curious about Indie Hacking and MicroSaaS and what it would take for me to create my own product or service.
